text: 31|21|Arau sihamtaka yetiya koraa haya ye, ‘allahe yi aratirna karaiche tomaloke seya anusarana karaa’. Sihamte kaya, ‘baram ami amara pitrpurausa sakalaka yitora oparata pa'icho se'itorae'i anusarana karaima’. Cayatane yadi sihamtaka jbalanta ju'ira pine ahbana karae tathapi'o, (sihamte pitrpurausa sakalara anusarana karaibane)
